description: Examples combining loops with conditional logic

input.natural_language: Loop through numbers and only show even ones

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:loop type="range" var="i" from="1" to="10">
  <q:if condition="{i} % 2 == 0">
    Even: {i}
  </q:if>
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Outputs: Even: 2, Even: 4, Even: 6, Even: 8, Even: 10

input.natural_language: Loop through scores and categorize each as pass/fail

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="scores" type="array" value="[45, 78, 92, 55, 88]" />
<q:loop type="array" var="score" items="{scores}">
  <q:if condition="{score} >= 60">
    {score}: Pass
  <q:else/>
    {score}: Fail
  </q:if>
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Outputs: 45: Fail, 78: Pass, 92: Pass, 55: Fail, 88: Pass

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="items" type="array" value="['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']" />
<q:set name="target" value="banana" />
<q:set name="found" type="boolean" value="false" />
<q:loop type="array" var="item" items="{items}">
  <q:if condition="{item} == {target} AND {found} == false">
    Found: {item}
    <q:set name="found" type="boolean" value="true" />
  </q:if>
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Stops at first match (simulated with flag)

input.natural_language: Loop and assign letter grades with elseif

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="scores" type="array" value="[95, 82, 76, 68, 45]" />
<q:loop type="array" var="score" index="i" items="{scores}">
  Student {i}:
  <q:if condition="{score} >= 90">
    Grade A
  <q:elseif condition="{score} >= 80"/>
    Grade B
  <q:elseif condition="{score} >= 70"/>
    Grade C
  <q:else/>
    Grade F
  </q:if>
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Assigns letter grade to each student

input.natural_language: Loop through list but skip null/empty entries

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:set name="names" type="array" value="['Alice', '', 'Bob', null, 'Charlie']" />
<q:loop type="array" var="name" items="{names}">
  <q:if condition="{name} != '' AND {name} != null">
    Valid: {name}
  </q:if>
</q:loop>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Outputs only: Valid: Alice, Valid: Bob, Valid: Charlie
